import {useState} from 'react' import './Detail.css' import {tableList} from '../../dummyData/dummy' const Detail = ({info}) => { console.log(tableList.find(user => user.id === info).name) const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ name: tableList.find(user => user.id === info), grade: `tableList.find(user => user.id === info).grade`, profile: `tableList.find(user => user.id === info).profileImg` }); const {name, grade, profile} = inputs; const onChange = (e) => { const {value, name} = e.target; setInputs({ ...inputs, [name]: value }); } return ( info !== 0 ?
